content.p: EcoKnights Social Media Internship Description: EcoKnights is a not-for-profit environmental organisation registered with the Malaysian Registrar of Societies. The organisation was founded by Yasmin Rasyid and Mariam Osman in 2005 as a small collective offering urban community assistance in developing their own environmental initiatives. Today, EcoKnights employs six full time officers and is managed by a Board of Committees which consists of seven members, with the professional guidance of three advisors. EcoKnights’ mission is to inspire sustainable living among Malaysians through: Requirements: How to apply: Please send your CV along with a brief cover letter that describes your interest in the position to andrew@ecoknights.org.my. Please write “Social Media Internship” in the subject line of your e-mail. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
